game.description: The village of Oakwood is plagued by a group of bandits that have been terrorizing the local travelers.
game.objective: Defeat the leader of the bandits and put an end to their reign of terror.

tasks.description: Gather information about the bandits' hideout from the villagers.
tasks.objective: Talk to at least 3 villagers and gather information.

tasks.description: Infiltrate the bandits' hideout and gather intel on their leader.
tasks.objective: Steal a map or document that reveals the leader's identity.

tasks.description: Confront and defeat the leader of the bandits.
tasks.location: Bandit's Hideout (after revealing leader's identity in task 2)

game.title: The Bandit's Bane
